meanings.definition: A medical condition in which patches of skin become rough and inflamed, with blisters that cause itching and bleeding.
meanings.sent1: My sister has eczema on her arms, making her skin red and itchy.
meanings.sent2: The doctor prescribed a cream to soothe the eczema on my hands.
meanings.sent3: During winter, my eczema acts up, making me look like a spotted leopard.
meanings.sent4: The eczema on his face was a fiery map of discomfort.
meanings.sent5: The eczema on her legs was a constant reminder of her skin's sensitivity.

meanings.definition: An itchy inflammation of the skin.
meanings.sent1: The eczema on his back made him squirm with discomfort.
meanings.sent2: She applied a soothing lotion to calm the eczema on her elbows.
meanings.sent3: The eczema on his neck seemed to have a mind of its own, itching at the worst times.
meanings.sent4: Her eczema was like a persistent itch that refused to go away.
meanings.sent5: The eczema on his hands felt like tiny fires burning under his skin.
